attributes.action: Boris Johnson must resign following his attempt to unlawfully suspend parliament
attributes.background: Johson lost his majority on live TV, fired his hero's grandson, set the record of losing his first six votes in Parliament (breaking the previous record of five set by Boris Johnson earlier that same evening), lied to the Queen, hid from a press conference and broke the law.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for someone to lose their job.
